options: ['he was badly hurt', 'he wanted to buy a map', 'he lost his way', 'he needed some help']
questions: When Sam sat up and said, "Where am I?" the old man thought  _
article:
Sam was an English student. He always stayed at home for his holidays. But last winter he thought, "I have never left the country. All my friends have been to Spain. They like it very much. So this year I'm going there for my holiday."
First he went to Madrid and stayed in a small hotel for a few days. One morning he went out for a walk. In his country people drive on the left, but in Spain they drive on the right. Sam forgot about this, and while he came to a busy street, a bike knocked   him down.
Sam lay on the ground for a few seconds and then he sat up and said, "Where am I?"
An old man was selling maps at the side of the street. He quickly came to Sam and said, "Maps of the city, sir?"
